Title: American imperialism is the common enemy of all the people in the world!
Designer: Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House Propaganda Poster Group (上海人民美术出版社宣传画组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: A caricature of Lyndon B. Johnson, at that time President of the USA. He and the other parachuter are falling towards pointed shapes, representing bayonets, spears and pointed bamboo stakes (as used in pitfalls by the North Vietnamese).This is a print from the second edition (February 1965).
